description.en:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
description.hu: Hestia, a főhősnőnk a kedvenc regényének egy gazdag mellékszereplőjeként ébred egy nap. Rajongóként legelső dolga, hogy nemesi címet vásároljon magának annak érdekében, hogy az imádott drágaságát, a regény second male lead-jét, Caelust láthassa az arisztokrata bálokon. Hestia úgy dönt, csak külső szemlélő lesz, nem avatkozik bele a cselekményszálba. A regény eredeti befejezését követő évben azonban olyan váratlan dolog történik Caelus-szal, ami Hestiát mégis cselekvésre készteti, hogy a bias-a elkerülhesse a tragikus befejezést.1

"내 최애를 살려내!"
N회차 정주행할 만큼 애정하던 로판 소설에 빙의한 헤스티아,
엑스트라 of 엑스트라에 빙의한 덕에 주인공들을 직관하고 드디어 맞이한 작품의 엔딩!
엔딩 후 현실로 돌아가게 될 거란 예상은 산산조각이 나고,
소설의 엔딩 후 비하인드가 가장 애정하는 캐릭터였던 서브남 카엘루스의 죽음이라는 충격에서 벗어나기도 전에
소설의 엔딩 직후로 회귀하는데…!
그렇다면 이번엔, 내 최애를 지켜내겠어!

description.en:
The story of a middle aged man doing whatever he wants with the power of 1-click online shopping!  

Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store.

By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.

The mail order life of a middle aged man in other world begins now!

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)

---

Após a reencarnação, Toru recebeu um [Quadro de Habilidades] por uma deusa. Aproveite ao máximo para adquirir todas as habilidades necessárias! Mesmo sendo uma "pessoa inferior", ele chegará ao topo?

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

悪意が蠢く水門都市へ、集え歴戦の英雄たち。

『聖域』での戦いから一年、平穏な日々を送るナツキ・スバルだったが、王選候補者の一人、アナスタシアの招待により、一行は水門都市プリステラへと出発した。水の都で懐かしい面々と旧交を温めるスバル達。しかし、その裏では悪意が蠢いていて――。
description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

description.en:
Each time a Demon Lord has appeared, a human hero has slain it, pushing back the demons in the dark lands. 
As the cycle starts over again, a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile, an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom…
description.fr:
L'histoire fantastique de l'excentrique et mystérieuse héroïne Ramia et des démons qui s'opposent à elle.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/TheGoldenSmurf)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10669208)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/thegoldensmurf)
description.id:
Setiap kali seorang Raja Iblis memunculkan diri, seorang bahadur manusia telah tampak ’tuk menakluknya, mendorong mundur para iblis ke negeri gulita.
Dengan mulainya lagi daurnya, seorang bahadur kuno misterius bernama Ramia muncul kembali. Sementara itu, sebuah laskar Iblis taknormal tiba-tiba menyerang kerajaannya...
description.ru: Фэнтезийный эпос, посвященный необычному и таинственному герою по имени Рамия.
description.tr:
Ne zaman bir İblis Lordu ortaya çıksa, bir insan kahraman onu öldürerek karanlık topraklardaki iblisleri geri püskürtmüştür.
Döngü yeniden başlarken, Ramia adında gizemli bir antik kahraman yeniden ortaya çıkar. Bu sırada, anormal bir İblis ordusu aniden krallığa saldırır...
description.es-la:
Cada vez que aparecía un Lord de los Demonios, un héroe humano lo eliminaba, haciendo retroceder a los demonios a las tierras oscuras.
Mientras el ciclo empieza una vez más, una antigua y misteriosa heroína llamada Ramia reaparece. Y mientras tanto, un ejército anormal de Demonios azota repentinamente al reino...

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.en: I Want to End This Love Game

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero acabar com o jogo do "eu te amo"

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

title.en: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

altTitles.en: Time Slip of the Fist King

description.en:
In a world where humans enslave other races, the archmage ‘Laefenhart’ is treated as the Demon King by the humans for his sins of helping the other races. 

A group of Heroes came to subdue the Demon King! ‘Laefenhart’ succeeds in causing great damage to the Hero party, but ends up being in danger of being killed by the Fist King, ‘Tesron’…

“Space-Time Return Spell.”

The magic spell cast as a last resort miraculously succeeds and sends ‘Laefenhart’ to the past. However…

I became one of the Heroes, the Fist King, ‘Tesron’, who had the strongest body on the continent?!

The archmage ‘Laefenhart’, with his newly acquired physical strength, changes the world with new powers!

In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!
A comic about the daily life of dungeon boys. Slaying the city, saving the dragons... or something like that.

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". What is her daily life like...?!

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.uk: Акане Нішімура — сором’язлива та похмура дівчинка початкової школи, яка через свою зовнішність має безпідставну жахливу репутацію у своєму класі. Тайо Такада — новий учень, який перевівся з невеликої сільської школи, і якому подобається унікальність Нішімури, яку її однокласники використовують, щоб познущатися з неї, вважаючи, що її «темрява» виглядає моторошно. Через нестримну та фундаментальну радість, яку проявляє Такада, будучи її другом, Нішімура починає розуміти, що бути собою не так вже й погано, як вона думала.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

altTitles.en: A Witch's Memoir

description.en: Lily, a black witch who was brought to the castle during a witch hunt when she was young and is still used by the king for her power even as an adult. She lives each day enduring both fear and scorn. Then one day, she meets a new court jester. Unlike other jesters, she is disliked for his flattery, but the jester shows favor to the witch. Why does the jester show favor to the witch? Can the witch ever get her free life back?

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao Ashi

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生、乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢に転生する

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei, Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou ni Tenseisuru

altTitles.en: A High School Boy Reincarnates as the Villainous Daughter in an Otome Game

description.en:
One day, "I," an ordinary high school boy living in the present day, was hit by a truck and reincarnated in another world. But what a surprise it was to find out that I was reincarnated as Elena Evan, the "villainess" of an otome game!

If this continues, the future that awaits me will either be condemnation, execution, or exile... I want to avoid that at all costs. While I was worrying about this, I found a glimmer of hope. If Tiara, the main heroine, and I could get together and find a yuri route for us, maybe we could avoid a bad ending...?

However, I am now beset by a number of beautiful and handsome men...?
description.ja:
現代に生きるごく普通の男子高校生である「俺」は、ある日トラックに轢かれて異世界に転生してしまう。しかし、転生した先はなんと乙女ゲームの「悪役令嬢」エレナ・エヴァンだった――！

このままだと待つ未来は、断罪・死刑・国外追放……。それだけはなんとしても阻止したい。悩んだ俺はひとつの光を見出す。正ヒロインのティアラと俺が結ばれて百合ルートになれば、バッドエンドを回避できるんじゃないか…!?

しかし、そんな俺の前に立ちはだかるのは見目麗しい数々のイケメンたちで――!?

Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.

Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?

description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

description.ja:
いつも完璧を勝ち取る吉田ローガン。 しかし、不意の事故により下半身不随の障害を負い、社会から捨てられる。 絶望に陥った彼に訪れた、革命的なVRゲーム「ミドルアース」による新しい世界が始まる。 だが、とあるトラブルによりキャラクター選びを大間違い！一番能力の低い「マスケット銃士」を選んでしまう！ “クッソ…俺は他の奴と違う。俺が本物のマスケット銃の力を見せてやる！”

---

description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.es-la: ¡Una serie sobre un juego de fantasía hiperrealista! "Sargent Ha, loco bastardo. ¿Disparó otra ronda completa de tiros al blanco?" El francotirador Ha Lee Ha simplemente quería ser parte del ejército para siempre. Sin embargo, debido a un desafortunado accidente, quedó parapléjico y fue devuelto a la sociedad. El revolucionario juego de realidad virtual [Middle Earth] le presentó una nueva vida. ¡El dinero obtenido en [la Tierra Media] tiene valor en el mundo real! Sin embargo, ¡arruinó su oportunidad al seleccionar el personaje de nivel más bajo! "No soy como los demás. Esto es todo lo que tengo". Pólvora negra, bolas de hierro y baquetas ... ¡Les mostraré lo que es un verdadero 'mosquetero'!
description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

altTitles.en: Spirit-Snaring Schoolgirl Akane

altTitles.ja-ro: Joshi Kousei Joreishi Akane!

description.en:
Akane Shinonome is an ordinary high school girl who dislikes greed. However, when her irresponsible father disappears with his mistress and her savings, Akane decides to follow in his footsteps and become an exorcist in order to make a living! But the style of exorcism she learned from her father is a little... unconvenional?

---
**Notes:**
- Chapter 1 is the same as the pre-serialization oneshot.
description.ja: 東雲茜はちょっぴり金に汚いものの、どこにでもいる普通の女子高生。のはずが、愛人と蒸発した父親に預金を持ち逃げされたことをきっかけに、生活費を稼ぐため父親の跡を継ぎ、除霊師として活動することに！　父親直伝の怪しいテクで、今日も霊を祓いまくる！　当然　霊なんて見えない

description.en:
Rei is a ruthless man who travels throughout the world in search of a certain someone. But he was not always ruthless and without compassion–both his search and his anger are driven by vengeance.  
  
The one who stripped Rei's humanity from him is the one Rei must find and destroy, despite any and all barriers. Rei will only become a normal human being once that vengeance is fulfilled. Until that day, he can only roam the world as a furious lone wolf, a lone wolf who preys on those who oppose him.

altTitles.ja: マッハ ゴゴゴ

description.en: Go Mifune (AKA Speed Racer) enters races all across the world, as he gets wrapped up in international conspiracies and do-or-die situations while also dealing with the enigmatic Masked Racer X...

description.en: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman who one day is run over, and left in the street to die, however, when he regains consciousness, it seems as though he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

altTitles.ja: 真の安らぎはこの世になく-シン・仮面ライダー SHOCKER SIDE-

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Yasuragi wa Konoyo ni Naku -Shin Kamen Raidā Shokkā Saido-

altTitles.en: Shin Kamen Rider 2023: Prologue

description.en: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
description.ja: 庵野秀明監督作品『シン・仮面ライダー』より、完全オリジナルの漫画プロジェクト！ 超豪華制作陣が『シン・仮面ライダー』作中最大の敵と、"SHOCKER"を描く、ダークヒーロー・ライジング・ストーリー！！

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

Я получил читерские способности в другом мире, и стал экстраординарным в реальном мире~ История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.

Tôi Trở Nên Phi Thường Ngay Cả Ở Thế Giới Thật

description.en: Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is…
description.pt-br: Tenjo Yuuya sofre bully desde criança. Sua vida se resumia em passar o tempo na casa de seu avô e ir para a escola. Porém, ele sofria uma rotina diária de bully severo em sua escola, algumas vezes o pobre Yuuya se via obrigado a pedir licença para curar suas feridas. Mas em uma dessas licenças, ele acaba descobrindo um armazém de objetos que seu avô guardava, e entre esses objetos estava uma porta misteriosa. E claro, ele abriu a porta, e lá ele encontrou…

altTitles.zh-ro: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao

altTitles.ja: ワケあり兄妹の禁断愛〜疫病神令嬢は小悪魔〜

altTitles.en: The Yandere Came During the Night

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

altTitles.ja: ラディア〜神殺しの私が神の恋人!?〜

description.es-la:
La búsqueda de venganza de Radia contra su traicionera amiga da un giro inesperado cuando Julius, un hombre misteriosamente poderoso, la salva de una experiencia cercana a la muerte.
¿El giro? Julius es un fantasma, visible solo para Radia.
ㅤ
Cuando se convierte en su compañero constante, Radia se ve envuelta en una red de contratiempos sobrenaturales que revelan cuán poderoso es realmente Julius.
Y aunque ni siquiera Julius conoce su verdadera identidad todavía, su casi omnipotencia podría ser la clave para que Radia se vengue.
Sin embargo, este poder también podría ocultar un peligro acechante que amenaza con reconfigurar su búsqueda de formas inesperadas y peligrosas...

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

altTitles.en: A Certain Dark Side's ITEM

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Anbu no Shoujo Kyousei

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

altTitles.en: Six People on Crosses

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

altTitles.en: Cross of Six Men

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...

description.en:
In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.

[Official English Volumes (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/my-dear-curse-casting-vampiress)
description.ja: 人間を喰い殺す「吸血鬼」が出現し、猛威を振るうようになった日本。特殊部隊の隊長・緒坂唯鈴は、吸血鬼から仲間を守りたい一心で国が非公式に拘束しているという「吸血鬼バロック」の誘拐を計画。あまりの美しさゆえ、見た者を狂い死なせるという伝説の「吸血鬼殺し」バロック。自らの立場も命も投げうち、彼女に協力を求める唯鈴にバロックは――。
